title: What is the interpretation of the water cycle in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and its correct meaning?

preview.html: Many people are involved in the world of dream interpretation and always want to have access to the interpretation of their dreams and the opinions of the most famous dream interpretation scholars. Therefore, the interpretation is affected by various factors, such as whether the dreamer is happy or sad, and whether he is single or married, male or female. In this article, we will explain the different interpretations of this dream, but we must note that all of these interpretations are nothing but personal judgments issued by scholars. You may be right or you may be wrong, and the whole matter is in the hands of God, and He alone knows the fate. Interpretation of the water cycle in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing a toilet in a dream means that a person will be exposed to many crises and problems. And if the dreamer sees him entering the bathroom to take a shower This vision indicates his repentance from the sins and transgressions he committed and changing his condition for the better. As for the vision of going to the bathroom and eliminating yourself, this vision indicates getting rid of worries and problems. In the case of bathing with cold water, this dream symbolizes goodness and happiness, but in the case of Bathing with hot water, this vision is a sign of the presence of a woman with bad morals in reality. Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of this dream varies depending on the nature of the dreamer and his psychological state. If the dreamer is anxious and afraid and cannot move in the dream, and the place around him is full of dirt, this means that He suffers a lot in his life. If the dream is disturbing and frightening, then the dreamer must seek help to get through this difficult period. Meaning of the bathroom in the dream If the bathroom in the dream is deserted, full of dirt and insects, and spreads unpleasant odors, this means that there are many envious people and pursuers in the dreamer’s life. If the place needs repairs and is not suitable for human use, this indicates that the dreamer needs to make some necessary changes in his life. If the dreamer cannot escape from the toilet, this means that he is unjust to many around him, and this dream is a strong indicator of dealing with justice and mercy. Smells The foul smell indicates the bad and malicious qualities of the dreamer, and he must correct his mistakes and deal gently so as not to experience remorse. If the bathroom is smaller than usual, this indicates that the dreamer is going through difficult financial circumstances and that he is suffering from accumulating debts that exceed his means. The symbol of the water cycle in the dream. Interpretation scholars agree Dreams are unanimous that the toilet is one of the unpopular places for the soul, therefore, if it comes in a dream, it often symbolizes evil and difficulties. If the dreamer comes out clean from the bathroom, this indicates the possibility of positive changes in his life. This dream indicates The dreamer’s situation will change and change from one situation to another. If unpleasant odors spread in the dream, this indicates the spread of false and malicious news in the dreamer’s life and this news affects his life in one way or another. If the bathroom is tightly closed to the dreamer, this means that he feels confined. There is no escape from it, there is no escape from it, and it is surrounded by

title: Interpretation of seeing cows in a dream in detail

preview.html: Here in this article is the interpretation of seeing cows in a dream. God Almighty created many animals that benefit humans and provide them with many benefits. The cow is one of the most important animals whose meat and milk are used. A person may see a cow in his dream and wake up confused because he does not know the interpretation of what it means. He saw it and whether his dreams portend good or portend evil. The interpretation of each dream varies according to the condition of its owner and the situation. In which the cow was, and through the following lines of the encyclopedia we will discuss in detail the meaning of a dream about cows. Interpretation of seeing cows in a dreamInterpretation of a cow in a dream by Ibn Sirin The world of interpretation, Ibn Sirin, believes that a dream about cows is a sign that there is a lot of goodness on the way to the dreamer. If If one dreams of a fat cow, the dream indicates that he will live a year full of abundant goodness. But if the cow is skinny in the dream, this means that the dreamer will live a year full of problems and little goodness. Interpretation of a dream about cows by Ibn Shaheen, from the point of view of the scholar Ibn Shaheen, from the visions A promising dream for a single person is that he slaughters a cow, because it is a sign that the fortuneteller will marry soon, or that he will obtain the opportunity to travel from which he will reap. Many livelihoods. When one sees the blood of a slaughtered cow in his dream, this dream is a harbinger for him that he will soon be saved from all his troubles and worries. If one dreams that a cow is chasing him, it means that he will hear good news soon. One of the undesirable dreams is seeing a cow Dead, because it is an indication of the presence of many problems that the dreamer is suffering from. Whoever dreams of slaughtering a cow in his home, the dream indicates that his family will face problems in the near future. If one sees in his dream that he is riding a black cow and bringing it home, this is a sign that he He will get a lot of money, and God Almighty will save him from a big problem. If a married man sees a pregnant cow in his dream, then this dream is good news that his wife will become pregnant. A dream about eating roast beef is good news for its owner that he will soon get a lot of money. Cows in A dream for a single woman: Whoever sees a cow in her dream while she is not married, then her dream here is a harbinger for her that her marriage is imminent. A white cow in one dream is a sign that God will bless her by marrying a rich man, and if the cow is thin, this means that she will marry a man who is suffering from financial problems. If An unmarried woman dreams of a fat cow. This is good news that she will marry a religious man with good morals. A single woman dreams of a black cow symbolizing the imminent search for work. An unmarried woman slaughtering a cow in a dream means the dreamer’s marriage will be delayed. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream for a married woman: A married cow indicates... The dream indicates that she is living a happy life with her husband. This vision may indicate that she will carry the standard and the coming of livelihood for her and her family. A fat cow in a married woman’s dream is good news for her that she will live a year in which there will be a lot of kindness and food. If the cow suffers from weakness, this means that The fortuneteller's life is full of problems and difficulties and he suffers from abuse by his relatives. Interpretation of a dream

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing honey in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing honey in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Honey is one of the most delicious foods that a person can eat, as mentioned in the Holy Qur’an. God favored honey by saying: “It comes out of her belly with another drink.” Seeing honey in a dream indicates the permissible diet and the abundance that the dreamer suffers from. Through the Moments website, we present to you all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing honey in a dream. We also mention to you the interpretation of the vision of eating honey in a dream for an unmarried woman. We explain to you the interpretation of a dream about honey for a married woman and tell you the interpretation of a dream about licking honey for a pregnant woman, in addition to the interpretation of eating honey for a pregnant woman. A woman who dreams in a dream sees beeswax in a dream. Interpretation of seeing honey in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq Imam al-Sadiq explained the vision of eating honey in a dream, indicating that the visionary has obtained a lot of money, as it indicates good luck, goodness and happiness. If a person sees that he is eating only honey in a dream and he is actually sick, this indicates his recovery or an indication that he will get rid of the disease. If a person eats someone else's honey in a dream, this indicates recovery. If a person sees that he is eating honey with his tongue in a dream, this indicates the arrival of days full of happiness and joy in the life that follows the vision. If a girl sees that she is eating honey and bread together in a dream, this means that she will get married soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing honey in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing honey in a dream means that the owner of the dream will get money or earn a lot of money, God willing. As for seeing honey draining from the fire, there are indications that this person enjoys distress and distress, God willing, and it shows that the water has been purified by intelligence, and it also indicates knowledge devoid of innovation and novelty. Similarities and God knows best. It also indicates the gift of God that has befallen the dreamer, he does not return to delusion after that, God willing, and God knows best. If one has honey in his hands, this is a sign of gaining a wealth of true and honest knowledge without innovation. He recites the Quran in a beautiful voice to people and God knows best. Eating honey in a dream If one sees in his dream that he tasted honey, this indicates that his marriage is approaching to a beautiful woman, if the person is single. If the person is married, this indicates that his wife loves him very much and is always trying to get close to him. If one sees in his dream that he has some honey that he eats and it is enjoyable, this means that the dreamer will meet a person who travels and is close to his heart and he will be very happy to meet him. If a person sees in his dream that he is consuming an amount of honey in the neighborhood, this is evidence that the dreamer will have a life full of joy and happiness and a great increase in his money and knowledge. When a person dreams in his dream that he is eating honey with his life partner, this vision indicates that the dreamer is facing many problems with his partner. Buying honey in a dream If a person sees that he is buying honey, this indicates the repayment of a debt if the person is suffering from debt and this vision indicates that he will earn a lot of money if he

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out in a single woman from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about one tooth falling out: A dream about teeth and molars is one of the dreams that can be repeated constantly for many people, especially seeing a tooth falling out, but we must say that the teeth and molars in the dream symbolize the dreamer’s relatives and household members and may also indicate many secrets hidden in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about falling out A tooth in an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out for an unmarried woman? The interpretation of a dream about one tooth falling out in a dream indicates the emergence of many disputes and problems in her life by her family, causing her harm, either by directing them with insulting words or through their actions towards her. Also, seeing one of her teeth falling out in her dream shows that she is inclined to engage in trade, but she is fickle in her opinion and hesitant. She may succeed sometimes and fail sometimes, but she will fall into a serious financial crisis. This vision was also interpreted as good news for the vision that she will get rid of problems and crises. That surrounded it, as scientists said that tooth extraction comes after severe pain and expresses relief after fatigue. A specialized Egyptian website on the Internet that includes a team of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. What is the interpretation of a dream about one molar falling out according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing teeth falling out in a dream is generally considered a sign of death or approaching the term or distress or catastrophe that will surround the dreamer. Seeing a woman’s teeth falling out in a dream and she was worried She felt fear, meaning that she would be exposed to a financial crisis or that her death or the death of one of her relatives was approaching. The scholar Ibn Sirin says: If a single woman’s molars fall out and blood drips from them in a dream, this indicates the death of a member of her family, but if her molars fall out without blood, this indicates the death of one of them. . From her neighbors or someone close to her will be exposed to a major crisis. If her molar suddenly falls out, the dream is a sign of harm or damage to one of her friends. The most important interpretations of a dream about a tooth falling out for one person. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out of a single woman’s handWhen an unmarried woman sees that her molars are falling out Her hand, this indicates her extreme disappointment in her life because she is thinking about some things, and the vision can be a good sign and indicates that the date of her marriage to a good man with good morals is approaching. If she sees that her teeth are falling out of her hand, this symbolizes that she is in a relationship with someone and is afraid To lose it, and the loss of her front teeth, especially in the dream, indicates this. She is losing her lover. Interpretation of a dream about broken teeth falling out in a dream for a single woman: Decay of molars or teeth in a dream indicates that the dreamer is worried or nervous about a certain matter, and if a girl sees in her dream that her molar is rotten and has it treated at the doctor, this means that something is recovering. The value of what she lost a long time ago, and in the event that she sees that her tooth has been severely damaged. When she sees that her teeth have been greatly eroded, this symbolizes the presence of a disaster that will find her. To overcome her problems in a timely manner. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman’s upper molar falling out

title: Interpretation of sleeping on the street In the dream in which you dreamed of a dream on the street

preview.html: The meaning of sleeping on the sidewalk of the street, the mosque, the ground, and the street outside the house, on someone’s bed, wakes me up for the single, the married, the pregnant, the divorced, and more, according to Ibn Sirin. Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi: In fact, sleep symbolizes relaxation and bliss. After a long day full of fatigue and exhaustion, we resort to our warm bed to get rid of our worries and escape from the arduous daily life. But what can a dream of sleeping on the street, far from our bedroom, indicate? What does a dream of sleeping on the road indicate? It may indicate the words of many people that are offensive to the viewer and his family. A dream of sleeping on the street is a sign of false and malicious rumors that affect the dreamer and his private life. This dream indicates neglect. It can symbolize the security surrounding the dreamer’s family. In this dream it is an indication of the trust that the dreamer carries and which is difficult for him to maintain. If the dreamer sleeps in a street full of trees, this indicates that he will have many children. If If he was sleeping on the road, the dream indicates that he overcame difficulties that would destabilize him in real life. Seeing him sleeping on the street means that the dreamer will suffer from diabetes or Alzheimer’s disease. If the dreamer is sick and sleeps on the road near graves, this indicates On his death. The dreamer sleeping on the road indicates problems and dangers in the dreamer’s life. This vision symbolizes the dreamer losing his money after starting a losing business. Interpretation of a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing ablution in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi

preview.html: When a person sleeps, he sees many dreams that carry many meanings and symbols, and this depends on the dreamer’s condition, as we mentioned. The science of dream interpretation and knowing the meanings of these symbols, its scholars have reached an interpretation of this vision: Seeing washing in a dream is one of the good visions... it indicates the extent of the dreamer’s honesty and chastity. And his chastity, just as washing is a symbol of purification from sins. This was confirmed by one of the scholars in the book Sleep is disturbed in the interpretation of dreams. If one of you sees ablution in a dream... this is evidence of nourishment and kindness in the state of ablution while performing ablution before. If the dreamer sees that he is washing in a dream, It means that he is trying to meet people's needs. If the fortuneteller completes his ablution in a dream, it means that he will receive a good and sufficient provision. It also promises the good news of God for the approval of this servant. If he washes with anything other than water, this indicates that he is suffering from a problem... but God’s comfort is near. But if the dreamer sees in the dream that he is performing the prayer without first performing ablution, this indicates that he is unable To make the decision himself. The symbol of washing in a dream is closely linked to prayer.. In addition, water in a dream shows kindness and nourishment, because it is the secret of life. Also, prayer is what connects the servant to his Lord. This vision indicates that the viewer is seeking the satisfaction of God Almighty. The interpretation of seeing ablution in a dream by Ibn Sirin is what Imam Ibn Sirin did so, with an explanation of the vision of ablution in a dream as follows: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is performing ablution with forgiveness inside his house, then this It means that there is someone who loves him and is returning from a trip after a long absence.. And if this dreamer is suffering from an illness, then this is a good omen.. News of recovery from this illness. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is standing, washing with impure water.. This is an indication However, this dreamer steals people’s money and steals their rights. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is standing, he will be washed with mud or other things that are not suitable for washing. This was an indication that this fortune teller will fail to achieve what he seeks, and it also shows that this fortune teller will fall into a lot of trouble and disaster. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is performing ablution with a group of people, this is a sign that he will be able to recover his stolen right and will be able to find For what was stolen from him a while ago. Imam Ibn Sirin showed in his interpretation of the vision of washing in a dream that it generally indicates goodness... meaning getting rid of the worry and distress that the fortuneteller feels, especially if the monarch dreams that he is praying after the removal. If the dreamer sees that he is performing ablution inside his house to perform the prayer... this indicates However, this dreamer will be able to pay off his debt, God willing. If these debts disturb the peace of days, this indicates that God - the Almighty - will grant him a lot of money. Other interpretations by Imam Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin was not satisfied with these previous interpretations, but rather began researching until he arrived at To a number of other interpretations related to the same vision, and among these interpretations: If the fortuneteller is a married woman or a girl he has not married before, and a person sees in his dream that he is performing ablution for the sake of prayer, this means that he will portend news.
preview.text: When a person sleeps, he sees many dreams that carry many meanings and symbols, and this depends on the dreamer’s condition, as we mentioned. The science of dream interpretation and knowing the meanings of these symbols, its scholars have reached an interpretation of this vision: Seeing washing in a dream is one of the good visions... it indicates the extent of the dreamer’s honesty and chastity. And his chastity, just as washing is a symbol of purification from sins. This was confirmed by one of the scholars in the book Sleep is disturbed in the interpretation of dreams. If one of you sees ablution in a dream... this is evidence of nourishment and kindness in the state of ablution while performing ablution before. If the dreamer sees that he is washing in a dream, It means that he is trying to meet people's needs. If the fortuneteller completes his ablution in a dream, it means that he will receive a good and sufficient provision. It also promises the good news of God for the approval of this servant. If he washes with anything other than water, this indicates that he is suffering from a problem... but God’s comfort is near. But if the dreamer sees in the dream that he is performing the prayer without first performing ablution, this indicates that he is unable To make the decision himself. The symbol of washing in a dream is closely linked to prayer.. In addition, water in a dream shows kindness and nourishment, because it is the secret of life. Also, prayer is what connects the servant to his Lord. This vision indicates that the viewer is seeking the satisfaction of God Almighty. The interpretation of seeing ablution in a dream by Ibn Sirin is what Imam Ibn Sirin did so, with an explanation of the vision of ablution in a dream as follows: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is performing ablution with forgiveness inside his house, then this It means that there is someone who loves him and is returning from a trip after a long absence.. And if this dreamer is suffering from an illness, then this is a good omen.. News of recovery from this illness. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is standing, washing with impure water.. This is an indication However, this dreamer steals people’s money and steals their rights. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is standing, he will be washed with mud or other things that are not suitable for washing. This was an indication that this fortune teller will fail to achieve what he seeks, and it also shows that this fortune teller will fall into a lot of trouble and disaster. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is performing ablution with a group of people, this is a sign that he will be able to recover his stolen right and will be able to find For what was stolen from him a while ago. Imam Ibn Sirin showed in his interpretation of the vision of washing in a dream that it generally indicates goodness... meaning getting rid of the worry and distress that the fortuneteller feels, especially if the monarch dreams that he is praying after the removal. If the dreamer sees that he is performing ablution inside his house to perform the prayer... this indicates However, this dreamer will be able to pay off his debt, God willing. If these debts disturb the peace of days, this indicates that God - the Almighty - will grant him a lot of money. Other interpretations by Imam Ibn Sirin. title: What do you know about the interpretation of seeing cats being kicked out of the house in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cats being expelled from the house in a dream: Cats are eliminated by many people who do not like to approach them, but at the same time there are those who love them and find special pleasure in raising them, so when you search for the interpretation of seeing cats from the house in a dream, we will find many interpretations that differ. Depending on the dreamer’s social status and according to the details of the vision. Interpretation of seeing cats being kicked out of the house in a dream. If the dreamer loves cats in reality, but saw him kicking them away in his dream, then this is a sign of radical changes in his life, some of which may be positive, depending on the situation in which he finds himself. In the dream. If he is afraid of her, then in reality he is afraid of the future and feels that failure and misery accompany him all the time, but this is not true. Success must have elements, the most important of which is for a person to strive to achieve his goals and for those goals to be realistic and achievable. If the male cat is the one who appeared in the dreamer’s dream, then there are some charlatans around him who want to harm him, and this may be the result of the hatred that fills their hearts against him, and when he pushes him Far away, it means that he has been freed from the evil of those evil people. The dream interpretation of expelling cats from the house in a dream is a sign of surviving conspiracies that he may be exposed to, and if he is suffering from major problems in his life, they will end very soon, faster than he imagined. Expelled Cats from the house in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The vision has many interpretations according to different details. If the cats appear hungry but the person expels them in his dream, this is a sign of his bad morals and that he does not treat people in a way that pleases God, which makes those around him not love him. As for the cats that cause fear and terror in the hearts, Her expulsion expresses the strength of the fortuneteller’s personality and his psychological balance despite the difficulties he is going through. If a single woman expels her, she faces a problem that she thinks is big, but she discovers that it is smaller than she thought, and she can overcome it very easily. One of the negative aspects of the vision is that if one sees that He chases a group of white cats. Unfortunately, he loses some good friends because of his bad behavior and feels remorse after that. Interpretation of seeing cats being expelled from the house in a dream for a single woman: The vision is positive for the girl if evil cats appear and chase her away, but if they are calm and do not appear wild, then regret awaits her. Some bad events. If she sees that a big black cat is approaching her and tries to chase her away but she is unable to do so, then this is one of the unpleasant visions as it indicates that she is falling prey to a cunning animal and she must seek help from the experience of those around her and do not hesitate to receive their advice to avoid getting into trouble. It cannot be solved. But if he can drive it out, he will overcome this evil without the slightest loss and start a new life based on the experiences he has gained through the experiences he has gained. If she sees kittens entering her room but gets scared and drives them away, then she is a girl with a shaky character who cannot take She makes important decisions in her life and always uses others and gets them involved

title: Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted prison in a dream to mean that it carries many meanings for whoever sees it, according to the events of the dream itself. Prison in a dream can indicate a long life or worldly problems, fears and sorrows. Whoever sees that he is imprisoned by choice, this is a sign of good health and that he does not suffer from illness. Seeing an open prison in a dream means that the dreamer will be saved from evil. Seeing a prison of unknown location and identity in The dream means that you will face difficulties in life. And whoever sees himself in prison being oppressed, this means injustice will happen to him from someone close to him, or it may indicate the cruelty of the dreamer’s family. Interpretation of the vision of prison for single women: Whoever sees herself in prison in her dream and she was an unmarried girl, this is evidence of Her marriage to a wealthy man, and seeing her leaving prison in a dream is one of the things that indicates that she heard good news or something positive happened that satisfied the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about prison for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is in prison, this is evidence of her closest livelihood and its abundance. Interpretation of a dream about prison For a pregnant woman, seeing a prison in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the ease of childbirth and that she will have a healthy, healthy child, as well as evidence of the loss of worry and anxiety from her life. Interpretation of leaving prison in a dream. Scientists have explained many of the places where you see prison in a dream and leaving prison, and they said that Whoever sees himself leaving prison after being acquitted, this indicates the disappearance of worries and problems, survival, and the achievement of a dear person. Desire for the dreamer and the answer to his prayers. And whoever sees himself getting out of jeans after pregnancy, this indicates freedom, a happy life, the removal of the problems he suffers from, and good deeds in religion and in this world. And whoever comes out of prison and wants to return to it again in his dream, this indicates the removal of worries and the removal of Problems from his life and protection from enemies and evils that may befall him, and it is a warning of his approaching death. Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi agreed on the interpretation of the dream about imprisonment with Ibn Sirin, as he said about it that it could be the death of their worries, the illness of the dreamer, the scheming of enemies, or the accumulation of debts. Other interpretations according to the location and interpretation of the dream.

title: Interpretation of elephant meat in a dream and eating elephant meat in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about elephant meat indicates gaining money and other interpretations that we will explain to single women, married women, pregnant women, and divorced men, such as buying elephant meat, slaughtering an elephant, or cooking or eating an elephant’s trunk. Dead elephant meat by Ibn Sirin, Al-Usaimi and others on the subject: Interpretation of elephant meat in a dream. Seeing elephant meat in a dream signifies that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money from a great and honest king. Whoever dreams of eating elephant meat will receive money from the president or from a man in power to the extent that he who sees that he has Eating an elephant’s limbs, skin, or bones means that he will receive money from the governor, minister, or higher official. A dream about an elephant symbolizes livelihood, profit, good deeds, and money if the meat tastes good and delicious. Also, seeing elephant meat in a dream indicates comfort after distress and hardship, and overcoming difficulties. And solve problems, God willing. If elephant meat spoils in a dream, the vision indicates illness and distress in life. To dream of elephant meat in your dream means that you feel physically exhausted and feel that perhaps there is something you want to say. Dreaming of elephant meat is a sign of your desires to have more Pleasure in your life. Seeing elephant meat in your dream is evidence that you need to revitalize yourself because you are holding on to something and it is ready to explode at any moment. You may have an important secret, some clues, or something similar. A dream about elephant meat indicates things that you are not reaching or getting close to, and the vision is telling you that you need to think of a new and better way of doing things. Unfortunately, dreaming about elephant meat is a warning dream about Not having an emotional connection with your father, you may face problems related to your relationship with your father. To dream of elephant meat is a message of accessing opportunities or information that you do not have but others do. Seeing elephant meat in a dream means that you are ready to explore the hidden and unknown aspects of yourself, and to see It tells you that you have a lot of power. Dreaming about elephant meat is evidence of your ability to succeed and excel. Seeing elephant meat also tells you that you can have fun and create successful social relationships with new people. Interpretation of eating elephant meat in a dream: Elephant meat does not harm the vision if it is fresh or its shape. Clean, as long as it looks like a sight free of impurities, it is a legal tender. As for meat in general, whether it is the meat of an elephant or other animals, if any. Rancid or worms come out, the dream is bad and has no good omens. Dreaming about eating elephant meat indicates that the project you were working on has been completed successfully and a feeling of pride in this accomplishment. Eating elephant meat means that you are repressing your emotions and giving up some of your strength, and your dream is a hint that you will participate in Projects that will not be completed. To dream of eating elephant meat means that you should be more open and express your feelings to others. To dream of eating elephant meat is a description of how your life is going. Maybe you are taking advantage of others or someone is taking advantage of you. Elephant meat in a dream means that you are living a sophisticated, elegant, and comfortable life. To dream of elephant meat
